name: Signs of Life (Demo)
description:
Breaching the boundaries of space, where none have dared to venture! Beyond the mysterious void, the call to adventure awaits!

When you explore the depths of space, you never know what you may find. Nihal, a world-class AI, journeys through a wormhole to take the first steps into an unexplored universe. Alongside a pair of brilliant scientists, Theo and Arturo, they are ready for whatever new horizons their destination has ready for them. However - upon arrival, what they discover becomes a sight unlike any they could have imagined, and they find themselves in a tale beyond their wildest dreams. 

Watercress is an international game developer and publisher consisting of approximately 50 members, with 15 members participating in this project.  Signs of Life is our ninth NaNoRenO release, and our 14th published game.

Full game coming soon!

Full Game Features

  • Ten sectors to search and explore
  • Interactable objects
  • Meaningful choices
  • Multiple endings
  • Full Voice Acting
  • Custom animations
  • Custom artwork
  • Original Soundtrack
